edge: Universal Pictures and Blumhouse Productions announced a remake of Firestarter (1984) on April 27, 2017.
Akiva Goldsman set to direct and produce Firestarter (1984) remake alongside Jason Blum.
On June 28, 2018, Fatih Akin replaced Goldsman as director for the Firestarter (1984) remake.
Scott Teems set to write the script for the Firestarter (1984) remake.
In December 2019, Keith Thomas replaced Akin as director for the Firestarter (1984) remake.
In September 2020, Zac Efron joined the cast for the Firestarter (1984) remake.
In February 2021, Michael Greyeyes joined the cast for the Firestarter (1984) remake.
In June 2021, Ryan Kiera Armstrong was added to the cast for the Firestarter (1984) remake.
In June 2021, Gloria Reuben was added to the cast for the Firestarter (1984) remake.
In June 2021, Sydney Lemmon was added to the cast for the Firestarter (1984) remake.
On April 27, 2017, Universal Pictures and Blumhouse Productions announced a remake of Firestarter (1984).
The score for the Firestarter (1984) remake was digitally released on May 13, 2022 by Back Lot Music.
